itunes:title: Episode 762 - Special Guest Super Bowl MVP Santonio Holmes
title: Episode 762 - Special Guest Super Bowl MVP Santonio Holmes
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former NFL wide receiver and Super Bowl XLIII MVP Santonio Holmes to talk about the upcoming big game between the Chiefs and Buccaneers, Mahomes vs. Brady, Holmes’s insane championship winning catch in 2009 a...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former NFL wide receiver and Super Bowl XLIII MVP Santonio Holmes to talk about the upcoming big game between the Chiefs and Buccaneers, Mahomes vs. Brady, Holmes’s insane championship winning catch in 2009 and what was going through his head before, during, and after he made the catch — plus Holmes talks about his MVP brand and educating young athletes on personal finance and knowing their worth.
